markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Wind-Catcher](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1393)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to a wind-powered vehicle

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune is invested by the captain or pilot of the vehicle. The vehicle gains a +5-foot item bonus to its Speed. If lack of wind prevents the vehicle from moving, it can still move at a Speed of 5 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wind-Catcher
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wind-Catcher (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 4,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus to Speed is +10 feet, and the minimum speed is 10 feet
name: Wind-Catcher (Greater)
